title: Understanding ecological impact of consumption choices
description: Understanding ecological impact of consumption choices
content:
Scenario: Understanding ecological impact of consumption choices
    Given Aisha's food choices affect environmental systems
    And she wants to minimize negative impacts
    When Aisha selects items in the Value Scanner
    Then the bioregional_elohim should show environmental impact
    And it should explain ecological consequences of different options
    And it should make invisible environmental costs visible
    And she should understand how consumption affects ecosystems
    And ecological literacy should inform decision-making
    And environmental impact should be transparent
